name: iValuHealth.NET
tag_list: mhealth, social-health-community, medicine, patients, medical-professionals, medical-service-providers, medical-equipment-manufacturers, insurance, kol, sme, ngo, foundations, telecom-operators
overview:
iValueHealth.NET (http://beta.iValueHealth.NET) is a Health related multilingual platform (or Hub) having +50K users who can access basic medical information, health applications and connect with healthcare professionals in just 2 clicks.

iValueHealth.NET has one of the largest online database featuring 30+ medicine fields, 600+ symptoms, 1100+ diseases and 3300+ medications. It is a unique initiative where all the actors from the healthcare ecosystem are brought together in one place and can contribute together to increase the awareness by sharing more local and global information. The company is member and have received support from mHealth Alliance (United Nations Foundations) and Microsoft BizSpark team.

Users can connect “free of charge” on the platform, using their email ID, and define their role when they connect for the first time (general user, medical professional, pharmacist…). Once connected, users can access different medical content and applications to which they get rights (based on their role). The platform will be accessible in 8 languages (English, French, Spanish, Italian, German, Romanian, Bahasa Indonesian and Tagalog Filipino – some of them are yet to go online).
